headline: Analysts See Continued Upside in Citizens Financial (CFG) Despite Strong YTD Performance
summary: Citizens Financial Group Inc. (NYSE:CFG) is among the 15 Undervalued Momentum Stocks That Are Taking Off. According to a February 9 report from TipRanks, JPMorgan raised its price target on Citizens Financial Group Inc. (NYSE:CFG) to $71 from $62.50 while maintaining an Overweight rating, reflecting a constructive outlook on large-cap banks. The firm updated its [因
